attributes.review: I love our president SO much that I downloaded this app but the constant notifications and the large storage space really made me think twice about how AMAZING our president is
attributes.title: Broke my phone

attributes.review: FAKE NEWS‼️‼️‼️ this app slowed my phone down and drains the battery. not worth the storage space☹️ all the things on it are fascist propaganda and no where NEAR the truth!!! i will be deleting it entirely from my phone.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: This app is super buggy and always crashed. I can’t even scroll without the app crashing right away. Idk who these developers are but they’re not that good at their job.
attributes.title: Not Good

attributes.review: i thought this was a FAN FIC about a crazy dystopian leader who is a pedo!! turns out this is real and he made this crappy app?? all he wants to do is get your phone number?? to what?? find where ya kids at?! no! creepy!
attributes.title: this cheeto guy is real??

attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking that our president was amazing✨ but i was SO WRONG 🤩🤩 donald trump is a white supremacist 😌 full stop. if you vote for him again you’re a white supremacist 😌 full stop. definitely give this app 1 star!! 🥰🥰
attributes.title: worst app ever❤️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and now my phone is glitching and keeps doing commands on its own. I think it installed a Chinese virus and now I literally have to set my phone on fire to get it to stop. Do NOT download.
attributes.title: Chinese spyware

attributes.review: At first my phone was perfectly fine but as soon as I downloaded it my phone started glitching. Would not recommend
attributes.title: Horrible app!!

attributes.review: As soon as the app was downloaded my phone started to glitch! I thought all the reviews were trolls but it’s true! Don’t get this app, it will mess up your phone! Very disappointed
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This is possibly one of the worst apps to ever be on the Apple store. It constantly glitches and I can’t even open my phone anymore. I absolutely hate it.
attributes.title: I hate it so much

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for informational purposes, but instead it’s just my boy barren begging to be saved. Then as soon as I tried to help ICE came and kicked me out of the US. At least I can still have TikTok 💅🏼
attributes.title: Help
